Modules¶

bm_copyNormals.py

bm_copyNormals.copyNormals(sourceObject=None, targetObject=None, threshold=0.01)¶

Smooths the transition between two separate meshes by making stacked vertices share vertex normals.

Parameters:
  • sourceObject (string) – The name of the polygon object to have the normals copied from
  • targetObject (string) – The name of the polygon object to have its vertex normals set
  • threshold (float) – The minimum world space distance that considers vertices “on top” of each other
Returns:

None
